summary: Renowned "ghost hunter", Carter Simms is paid to conduct a paranormal investigation of a supposedly haunted house. Along with a cameraman, a reporter, and a spiritual advocate, she embarks on a three night journey into terror.
cast: Patti Tindall|Mike Marsh|Davina Joy|Lindsay Page|Gordon Clark|April Hinojosa|Tim Wadhams|Stephanie Anne Landers|Sophia Morgan Stewart|William McMinn|Greta Skelly|Evelyn Ramos|Sarah Lawton|Jeff Tretta|Miguel Hinojosa|Sean Tretta
title: Muerte de una cazafantasmas
